item.description:
Join us again for some patio action at Battery Park Bar & Lounge in the Financial District of Boston.  We got a good group going early in July and it was fun times! Battery Park is welcoming MeetUp back with an outside bartender, games, cornhole, door prizes and a yet to be named beer/liquor sponsor. DJs Doze and Frank White will be spinning old skool hip hop, R&B and reggae.

Also, their Sunday brunch goes until 3pm and includes a "Make Your Own" Bloody Mary bar. ;)

 

UPDATE: Battery Park is welcoming us with open arms. We'll be doing a giveaway of a Twisted Tea cornhole set so practice up with yo' beanbags!  We'll also have other door prizes to give away.  BP is offering $4 Twisted Tea, PBR and Naraganssett.

 

NOTE: This event is cross-listed with 4 other MeetUp groups. Let's take over the patio AGAIN!
item.how_to_find_us: Will be on patio. I look like my picture, or just ask the hostess who I am.
item.name: "Back to the Patio" at Battery Park, Sunday, July 22nd
